.. _`busco`:

BUSCO
=====

Assess assembly and annotation completeness with BUSCO 






Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule run_busco:
        input:
            "sample_data/target.fa"
        output:
            "txome_busco/full_table_txome_busco.tsv",
        log:
            "logs/quality/transcriptome_busco.log"
        threads: 8
        params:
            mode="transcriptome",
            lineage_path="sample_data/example",
            # optional parameters
            extra="" 
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-225-gb77af9ed/bio/busco"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
